## zelos.Drawer class

An object that draws a block based on the given rendering information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Drawer extends BaseDrawer 
```
**Extends:** [BaseDrawer](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.drawer_class.md)
